thread.title: Himachal all set to host India's first Paragliding World Cup from today - newsR
thread.title_full: Himachal all set to host India's first Paragliding World Cup from today - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Himachal all set to host India's first Paragliding World Cup from today - newsR
text: 23 Oct 2015The Paragliding World Cup will begin today at Bir Billing near Baijnath town in Kangra district of Himachal Pradesh .State Urban Development Minister and President Billing Paragliding Association Sudhir Sharma said, this is for the first time that this event is being organised in a South Asian country. Â»
